alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 2:01AM MST until February 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible with locally higher amounts. Light ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch are possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills from 0 to -10 could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation as the forecast is still likely to change.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
